formattedAddress: 240 Central Park S, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 240 Central Park S, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: We hired Sergey for our wedding photography and doing so was something we will never regret. The photos he captured for us are breathtaking. Not only are they crisp, timeless and romantic but he captured every single moment from the wedding. We had a single day Indian-American fusion wedding and so there were multiple moments that we had hoped would be captured and to no surprise, Sergey got every single one. He is incredibly talented and kind throughout the planning process. I would 100% recommend him to anyone who is looking for an amazing wedding photographer. The only downside you will find in hiring him is having too many gorgeous photos to choose from when the wedding is over!

originalText.text: We used Sergey for our Engagement photos and we are SO happy we chose to work with Sergey. He was so easy to work with and the process was seamless. His work is absolutely outstanding and perfection! I 100% recommend using Sergey as your photographer. You will not be disappointed. We got so many compliments from family and friends about how stunning these pictures turned out. I would love to work with Sergey again in the future!

text.text: We used Sergey for our Engagement photos and we are SO happy we chose to work with Sergey. He was so easy to work with and the process was seamless. His work is absolutely outstanding and perfection! I 100% recommend using Sergey as your photographer. You will not be disappointed. originalText.text: Where to begin - Serge photographed my husband and I's September 2023 wedding and we are in awe at our photos. Serge's eye and talent is unlike any other - the way he plays with light, poses you perfectly and edits is all a work of art. My husband is a videographer but also does photo so he naturally has a pickier eye, and he said there is no one like Serge. Go with Sergey Lapkovsky as your wedding photographer and you will NOT be disappointed and will have wedding photos that will truly stand out.

originalText.text: We had an absolutely fantastic experience with Sergey! We did a lot of research before choosing a wedding photographer, and we are so happy we trusted Serge to capture the biggest day of our lives. Sergey took our engagement photos in Central Park and our wedding photos at the Venetian in NJ. We have gotten nothing but nonstop compliments from family and friends on how beautiful both sets turned out. Sergey was so easy to work with from beginning to end--professional, patient, organized, and conscientious. Our wedding was on the larger side with a lot of moving parts, and somehow Sergey was everywhere at once, capturing every moment and giving us so many incredible photos of the entire thing. Turnaround time was very quick, and all the prints we ordered turned out amazing. We cannot recommend Sergey highly enough!!

text.text: We had an absolutely fantastic experience with Sergey! originalText.text: Words cannot describe how thankful and blessed we were to have Sergey as our wedding photographer. Without him our wedding day would not have been as flawless as it was. A month prior he organized a meeting to coordinate our day from beginning to end. He was honest with us and realistic about timings, Sergey wasn't just a photographer but essentially also a day-of coordinator. He truly wants to make your day as least stressful as possible. Sergey is full of positivity, composure, and with a stress free/ light energy that everyone gravitated toward. Every stressful moment turned into smiles and laughter. Once we received all the photos my husband and I were absolutely speechless. Sergey helped us pose and took all the right angles, I can't even believe how beautifully every moment was captured. His style is timeless and so elegant, you will never be disappointed with his talent. 10/10 would recommend him to be anyones wedding photographer!! Thank you again and again Sergey!
